source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide shot of modern, multi-story residential buildings lining a canal on a sunny day. A pedestrian bridge crosses the water in the foreground. The scene is still, with no camera movement or significant action taking place.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
